job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You will be working within a global team, reporting to the local Development Manager. You will be primarily responsible for design, code and unit test of new product features. Additionally, you would be required to work on product documentation, build automation and with QA teams on resolution of defects., * Review Requirement documentation and technical specifications
     * Design, Code & Unit test product features
     * Defect resolution, working with QA team on resolution of issues
     * Provide input into planning and status tracking

   What we offer:
     * Working for a top 5 IT company according to Forbes 2022 best employers ranking
     * International and prestigious projects
     * Highly skilled teams of experts
     * Wide range of IBM trainings and certificates
     * Unlimited access to Udemy, Harvard Business Review, Safari O'Reilly, getAbstract, IBM AI Skills Academy
job_details.full_text:
Backend Developer

You will be working within a global team, reporting to the local Development Manager. You will be primarily responsible for design, code and unit test of new product features. Additionally, you would be required to work on product documentation, build automation and with QA teams on resolution of defects., * Review Requirement documentation and technical specifications
     * Design, Code & Unit test product features
     * Defect resolution, working with QA team on resolution of issues
     * Provide input into planning and status tracking

   What we offer:
     * Working for a top 5 IT company according to Forbes 2022 best employers ranking
     * International and prestigious projects
     * Highly skilled teams of experts
     * Wide range of IBM trainings and certificates
     * Unlimited access to Udemy, Harvard Business Review, Safari O'Reilly, getAbstract, IBM AI Skills Academy

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional backend development tasks such as designing, coding, and unit testing new product features, with no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. It lacks the specific technical requirements and responsibilities associated with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer roles.

phrases: design, code and unit test of new product features
Review Requirement documentation and technical specifications
Design, Code & Unit test product features
Defect resolution, working with QA team on resolution of issues
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the core activities of building, testing, and maintaining software applications, which falls under traditional software development.

phrases: Review Requirement documentation and technical specifications
Provide input into planning and status tracking
job_tasks.justification: Reviewing documentation and providing input into planning indicates an understanding of project requirements and business context.
While 'build automation' can be broad, in a software development context, it often refers to CI/CD pipelines, which are a component of operations engineering.

soft_skills.justification: Working in a global team and collaborating with QA teams highlights the need for effective communication and collaboration.

phrases: Unlimited access to Udemy, Harvard Business Review, Safari O'Reilly, getAbstract, IBM AI Skills Academy
soft_skills.justification: The provision of extensive training resources suggests an emphasis on continuous learning and adaptability.
The focus on defect resolution and issue resolution points to a need for problem-solving skills.

phrases: design, code and unit test of new product features
soft_skills.justification: Designing and coding new features implies taking ownership of product development and potentially driving innovation within those features.
